name: Light Your Way
description:
Light Your Way was made during the Brackeys 2018 game jam.

Unortunately the game is unfinished.

EDIT : 02/SEP/2018

I am now working on re-making this game in a 3D world space, and this will be FAR more polished, and will have much more content as I will have longer than a week to make it.
